name: Pair Of Stamps
description:
This fun find-a-pair puzzle game will help improve your attention and memory, making you smile and sometimes think, both the kid and the bearded guy.

Click or touch one of the stamps to turn it over and try to find a pair, if there is no pair, then the stamps will turn back over. The time and number of moves spent on the level will affect the final result!

Challenge your friends, complete levels quickly, and most importantly, improve your attention and memory!
